title: 'Domain This' Contest > Win a ticket to SMASH Summit in NYC
content: WINNERS ANNOUNCED: CONGRATS John and Max! Our friends over at .CO are giving away a SMASH Summit ticket to the champ who provides the funniest  .CO domain name to the pic below HOW IT WORKS: 1. Post your .CO domain idea (i.e. nakedcowboy.co) in the comment section below > You have to scroll down. 2. When the contest has ended, the .CO gurus will select a winner. 3. We'll post the winner to our blog and notify via email 4.  The free ticket can be used for future events so play along if you can't attend SMASH Summit!
